subject: Foreign accent..?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:

I can hear some English words. but not enough to understand. As far as I 
knopw the only non English broasd cast here are in Spansih. Somethng like 
"the Little bit is taping the people", I think it's more Soviets.


Frank-S
